actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to permit a State or local unit of government to acquire able-bodied individuals who are not specifically exempted to perform public service employment in community work and training programs at the discretion of local, State, and Federal officials, without cash remuneration, as a condition of their continuing eligibility for welfare and food stamps.

summary.text: Permits a State or local unit of government to require individuals, who are not specifically exempted, to perform public service employment in community work and training programs at the discretion of local, State, and Federal officials, without cash remuneration, as a condition of their continuing eligibility for welfare and food stamps.

titles.title: A bill to permit a State or local unit of government to acquire able-bodied individuals who are not specifically exempted to perform public service employment in community work and training programs at the discretion of local, State, and Federal officials, without cash remuneration, as a condition of their continuing eligibility for welfare and food stamps.
